description:
godoc: support multiple examples
gotest: document examples
go/doc: tidy comment

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5235055/diff/1/src/cmd/gotest/doc.go
File src/cmd/gotest/doc.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5235055/diff/1/src/cmd/gotest/doc.go#newcode38
src/cmd/gotest/doc.go:38: Multiple example functions may be written for an XXX by appending "_YYY" to
odd that you use XXX YYY and then 2.
Multiple example functions may be provided for a given name XXX if they are
discriminated by a distinct suffix starting with "_", such as ExampleXXX_2.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9c743824e7d6 ***

godoc: support multiple examples
gotest: document examples
go/doc: tidy comment

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5235055

subject: code review 5235055: godoc: support multiple examples
